import React from 'react' import {Card,CardImg,CardTitle,CardText,CardBody,CardSubtitle,Button} from 'reactstrap' const About = () => { return( <>

About me

I am Sivaraman

I am a enthusiastic and self-motivated person looking for a career opportunity to expand my learnings, knowledge, and skills, while making a significant contribution to the success of the company

I am a final year student pursuing my under graduation in Computer Science and Engineering from Kumaraguru College of Technology

Card title Card subtitle Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.
) } export default About
